summary: Bug fix verification for '+' button onPointerDown handler. All tests PASSED: Desktop MindFlow (1 node added), Mobile MindFlow (1 node added), Desktop MindHybrid horizontal (1 node added), Desktop MindHybrid vertical (1 node added). No double execution bug detected.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ Canvas.jsx: '+' buttons use onPointerDown with e.stopPropagation() and e.preventDefault() - CORRECT
✅ NodeAddButton.jsx: Uses onPointerDown with same pattern - CORRECT
✅ All buttons have touch-manipulation and select-none CSS classes for mobile optimization
✅ WebkitTapHighlightColor set to transparent to prevent visual feedback issues
✅ data-testid attributes present: add-child-button, add-child-horizontal-button, add-child-vertical-button, add-child-left-button, add-child-right-button, floating-add-button

test_1_desktop_mindflow.description: Click on '+' button creates exactly 1 child node (no double execution)

test_2_mobile_mindflow.description: Tap on '+' button creates exactly 1 child node (no double execution)

test_3_desktop_mindhybrid_horizontal.description: Click on horizontal '+' button creates exactly 1 child node

test_4_desktop_mindhybrid_vertical.description: Click on vertical '+' button creates exactly 1 child node

seed_data_creation: Verified user email (set email_verified: true) to bypass verification modal
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bug fix for '+' button verified. The fix uses onPointerDown instead of onClick/onTouchEnd to handle both mouse and touch events uniformly. All layout types tested: MindFlow (single button), MindHybrid (horizontal + vertical buttons). MindAxis layout was not tested due to map limit (3 active maps for free plan). Test user: testuser123/password123 with email_verified: true.
